sentences.en: He got sick easily since he was young , what a valetudinarian!
sentences.cn: 他从小就容易生病,是个病秧子.

sentences.en: His method proved successful in his case, but he was a valetudinarian, and most people would need something more vigorous .
sentences.cn: 他的方法证明成功的在他情况，但是他是病弱的人，而且大多数的人会需要更精力充沛的东西。

sentences.en: His method proved successful in his case, but he was a valetudinarian, and most people would need something more vigorous.
sentences.cn: 他的办法对他来说是的，但他是个体弱多病的人，而多数人需要的是精力充沛。

sentences.en: Objective Check the ash of valetudinarian for plague before 50 years , if exist plague in the soil near the ash.
sentences.cn: 目的检测死于5 0年前的鼠疫病人尸骨及尸骨周围土壤是否存在鼠疫菌。

sentences.en: She affected to be spunky about her ailments and afflictions, but she was in fact an utterly self - centered valetudinarian.
sentences.cn: 她装做对自己的失调和苦恼若无其事, 但是实际上她是为自己的健康状况非常发愁的人.

sentences.en: The valetudinarian alternated two hours of work with one hour of rest.
sentences.cn: 那个体弱多病的人每工作两小时就要歇一小时。

words.tran_cn: 无病呻吟者；体弱多病；久病衰弱
虚弱的；有病的；过分担心健康的

trans.tran_cn: 自认为自己长期有病的人，病人
